articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Ontario to allow private retailers to sell cannabis, province will handle online sales | CBC News
articles.description: Ontario's Progressive Conservative government announced today it will allow recreational pot to be sold in retail stores while the province will handle online sales.

articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Senate candidate: Minnesota is ready to flip to Republicans
articles.description: Karin Housley on running for Al Franken's vacated Senate seat.

articles.title: Tottenham forced to delay opening of new stadium until end of October after 'issues with critical safety systems'
articles.description: Tottenham have been forced to delay the opening of their new stadium at White Hart Lane until at least the end of October due to "issues with the critical safety systems".

articles.author: Benjamin Weir
articles.title: Wallaroo manhunt: Lockdown lifted, search continues
articles.description: A MANHUNT continues for a man wanted for “serious offences” but Wallaroo locals have been allowed to return to business as usual after heavily armed police officers locked down the town for the second time in a month

articles.author: Daren Butler
articles.title: Turkish lira pulls back from record low, markets rattled
articles.description: Turkey's lira pulled back from a record low of 7.24 to the dollar on Monday after the central bank pledged to provide liquidity, but it remained under selling pressure and its meltdown caused further unease on global markets.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: White House adviser Hassett: U.S. monitoring Turkey situation 'very closely'
articles.description: White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Monday the Trump administration is monitoring the financial situation in Turkey "very closely" after the Turkish currency fell sharply against the dollar in recent days.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/kellie-lazzaro/6795278
articles.title: Behind the scenes at an Australian alpine resort
articles.description: It is snow season in Australia but do you know what goes on behind the scenes to keep the ski resorts in shape?

articles.title: Source: Rookie Smith ends holdout with Bears
articles.description: Roquan Smith, the last unsigned rookie in the NFL,has agreed to end his holdout with the Bears, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

articles.author: Betsy Klein, CNN
articles.title: Trump signs McCain defense measure, doesn't thank McCain
articles.description: President Donald Trump thanked multiple members of Congress involved in passing the John S. McCain National Defense Authorization Act at a signing ceremony at Fort Drum, New York, Monday, with one major exception: the senator for whom the bill is named.

articles.author: Nicole Thompson
articles.title: GoFundMe says it’s reviewing Fredericton shooting fundraisers after police tweet
articles.description: The city’s police department said the families of two officers killed had not sanctioned them

articles.author: Sheyanne N Romero
articles.title: Golden State Killer suspect faces new murder charge. That makes 13 slayings linked to Joseph DeAngelo
articles.description: Joseph DeAngelo, 72, is accused of killing a Visalia, California, college professor who gave his life to stop his daughter from being kidnapped.

articles.title: Golden State Killer suspect faces new murder charge. That makes 13 slayings linked to Joseph DeAngelo
articles.description: Joseph DeAngelo, 72, is accused of killing a Visalia, California, college professor who gave his life to stop his daughter from being kidnapped.

articles.title: Don't blame wildfires on climate change – it's environmentalists' fault, says Zinke
articles.description: US interior secretary Ryan Zinke blames environmentalists for the devastation in California and calls for an increase in logging

articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: What the rumors say about Google’s upcoming Pixel 3
articles.description: Now that the Note 9’s all good and official, it’s time to move onto the next major smartphone. The Google Pixel 3 leaks haven’t quite hit the fever pitch we saw with Samsung’s device ahead of launch — though there’s still time. After all, it seems likely the …

articles.author: Jonathon Dornbush
articles.title: Is Spider-Man on PS4's Launch Trailer Teasing a Big Role for Miles Morales? - IGN
articles.description: Could Spider-Man on PS4's launch trailer be setting up a big turn for Miles Morales?

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Arnaiz leaves Barcelona for Leganes in €5m deal
articles.description: The youngster scored three Copa Del Rey goals in 2017-18, but Barcelona have sold Jose Arnaiz to Leganes.

articles.author: FourFourTwo
articles.title: Tottenham's move to new stadium delayed
articles.description: After hitting an obstacle late in the construction of their new stadium, Tottenham look set to stay at Wembley at least until November.

articles.author: Austin Knoblauch
articles.title: Roquan Smith agrees to rookie contract with Bears
articles.description: The long wait is over for Roquan Smith and the Chicago Bears. The rookie linebacker agreed to terms on his four-year contract with the team on Monday, Ian Rapoport reports.

articles.author: Josh Constine
articles.title: Facebook buys Vidpresso's team and tech to make video interactive
articles.description: Zombie-like passive consumption of static video is both unhealthy for viewers and undifferentiated for the tech giants that power it. That’s set Facebook on a mission to make video interactive, full of conversation with broadcasters and fellow viewers. It’s r…
